snippet: The Lowepro Flipside 500 AW camera bag had only been available to 1,200 pro photographers at the 2010 Winter Olympics. Now you can own one for $250.
abstract: The Lowepro Flipside 500 AW camera bag had only been available to 1,200 pro photographers at the 2010 Winter Olympics. Now you can own one for $250.

headline.main: An Olympian Camera Bag, Now for Mortals
headline.print_headline: A Camera Bag That Holds Everything but the Photographer
